verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
More holiness give me
More sweetness within
More patience in suffering
More sorrow for sin
More faith in my Saviour
More sense of His care
More joy in His service
More freedom in prayer

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come my Savior and help me
Comfort strengthen and keep me
Thou each moment wilt save me
Thou art saving me now

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
More gratitude give me
More trust in the Lord
More pride in His glory
More hope in His word
More tears for His sorrows
More pain at His grief
More meekness in trial
More praise for relief

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
More victory give me
More strength to o'er come
More freedom from earth-stains
More longings for home
More fit for the kingdom
More useful I'd be
More blessed and holy
More Saviour like Thee
